description:
Google Drive is a file storage and synchronization service offered by Google which provides user cloud storage, file sharing and collaborative editing. Google Drive encompasses Google Docs, Sheets and Slides, an office suite that permits collaborative editing of documents, spreadsheets, presentations, drawings, forms, and more. Files shared publicly on Google Drive can be searched with web search engines.

Modules included with this course:

  • Learn Google Docs
  • Learn Google Sheets
  • Learn Google Slides

By the end of this course you will be able to successfully use the Google Office Suite. The gist of Google Drive, and the main attraction to it, is it can store your files in the cloud where they are accessible to you and your collaborators, making them highly searchable.
title: Google Drive
